item.title: About
item.author: Dominic Cardellino
item.description: Who is Dominic Cardellino? I grew up in Leinfelden-Echterdingen, a city nearby Stuttgart, Germany. After school, I started my apprenticeship as an IT specialist (in german: Fachinformatiker). After this I gained some experience in System Administration at a german car manufacturer. But this did not satisfy my needs of working in IT. So I changed my employer and got my hands dirty as a Windows Server Administrator. Administering a virtualization environment with about 40 physical servers and more than 500 virtual servers based on VMWare was one part of my job.
